titleStmt.title: Poor Robins opinion of the present blazing star, appearing in the north-east part of the heavens, this present year, 1677 which is far more remarkable than any before of that nature, by reason of the strangeness of its position.
titleStmt.author: Poor Robin.
Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Winstanley is usually credited with authorship of the "Poor Robin" pamphlets, although imitators wrote some of them. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
